original_title: La lyre à jamais illustra le taudis
overview: The film does nothing but build the depth of the silence of life: only a few throws of the dice, a few flights of golden paper, a brief dialogue, the whistle of a boat, punctuate the silence of the film, which does not give to hear the sovereign unfolding of its images in black and white and in 16 mm.
title: La lyre à jamais illustra le taudis
